review.title: “wonderful property.”
review.pros: Pros – fun,happy staff always. very good team,good management
review.cons: Cons – every thing is better,good people,good management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – keep it up.good job

review.title: “wow”
review.pros: Pros – best and exciting hotel in doha
review.cons: Cons – always busy tired but oky
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
